Class CanvasArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • artstationapplication.CanvasArea

  • public class CanvasArea
extends java.lang.Object
    Display area that draws the grid, background, and shapes.

    Justin Wilder

      • update

        void update(processing.core.PVector mouse)
        This method is only called when the mouse is being pressed. If draw mode is active, the shape currently being drawn is adjusted via modify. If edit mode is active, the shape is updated based on the current transformation.
        Parameters:
        mouse -
